title: looking for ranked team!
body:
hey everyone im looking for a ranked team! i've been playing league alone ever since i started and never had a team and its hard to climb out of rank when doing solo queue because lets face it you end up with feeders/trolls/jerks. i would love to join a ranked team who are mature and serious about winning! i can do all lanes but i main SUPPORT!

bronze 3 currently!

ign: Paulieeeee

replies.body:
plsplsplsplspsllspslpslpslpslpslpslpslspslpls i main adc
i rely need u pls im stuck in elo hell
